title: 267: CHATTY BROS: Katie’s Bachelorette Night 1 Recap!
itunes:title: 267: CHATTY BROS: Katie’s Bachelorette Night 1 Recap!
description:
Grayston and Evan are here to tackle recap # 1 for Katie’s season of The Bachelorette! Evan starts off by giving Grayston a little surprise and then they chat Katie as Bachelorette, the new hosts, their fave limo entrances, the box, cat man, rv guy, their thoughts on Greg, and more! Grayson also reveals some Hollywood secrets and Evan raves about Costco. 

 

FOLLOW THE CHATTY BROS HERE: 

Grayston: https://www.instagram.com/pipyopi/

Evan: https://www.instagram.com/trippersounds/

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***FABFITFUN: use coupon code CHATTY for $10 off your first box at WWW.FABFITFUN.COM

***IMPERFECT FOODS: Get 20% off PLUS free shipping on your first order at IMPERFECTFOODS.COM using promo code CHATTY

***QUINCE: get 50-80% off top-of-the-line clothing and home goods, PLUS free shipping by texting BROADS to 64-000

***NUTS.COM: New NUTS.COM customers get free shipping on your first order when you text CHATTY to 64-000

***MODERN FERTILITY: get $20 off the test when you go to MODERNFERTILITY.COM/CHATTY

 

FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads/

Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah/

Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ
